Text.Page:
Kulkari attacks threaten our position here in the desert. If we could strike back harshly enough, they might back off. Track down {@LinkCreature:21#5001#Crag Stalker warlord Beldresk} and kill him.

In fact, bring back a fang and I'll hang it from our tent. Send them a message that we will not be intimidated!

The Crag Stalkers will think twice before attacking again, thanks to you.

It won't bring back the dead, but it might prevent more deaths. Well done!

I said it would send them a message, not that it would be easy. Just take your time and use your head.

You can do it!
